name: Cyberpunk MAGICAL Girls
description:
Get into the marvelous world of Sami, Killa and Phuyu, three girls searching for adventure, drugs, and fun!! BUt mostly drugs.

Devs were also very high while making this game.

No further questions will be taken.

SFX from Zapsplat, FMA and Freesound.

Programming, story and dialogue by Rusty.

Art and story by Krepen.

Game made for the 2021 NaNoReNo Game Jam.
https://itch.io/jam/nanoreno-2021
